mapper.sql: id, name, dis, businessZoneType, fatherid, cityid
mapper.insert:
insert into t_businesszone
id,
name,
dis,
businessZoneType,
fatherid,
cityid,

mapper.update:
update t_businesszone
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dis = #{dis,jdbcType=BIGINT},
businessZoneType = #{businesszonetype,jdbcType=BIGINT},
fatherid = #{fatherid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
cityid = #{cityid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update t_businesszone set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dis = #{dis,jdbcType=BIGINT}, businessZoneType = #{businesszonetype,jdbcType=BIGINT}, fatherid = #{fatherid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, cityid = #{cityid,jdbcType=BIGINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select b.id,b.name,b.dis,b.businesszonetype,b.fatherid,b.cityid,c.name as businesszontypename from t_hotelbussinesszone a left join t_businesszone b on a.businesszoneid=b.id left join t_businesszonetype c on b.businessZoneType=c.id where hotelid=#{hotelid}
